plot: Rick helps Jerry out with the dog.

When one of Rick's inventions causes the family dog, Snuffles, to gain sentience, the family must stop Snuffles and the other dogs from taking over the world. Meanwhile, Rick and Morty "incept" Morty's math teacher in an attempt to change Morty's math grade from an F to an A, so Morty's parents will continue to allow Rick to take Morty out of school for interdimensional adventures.
